reviewText: Although the picture quality could have been better (this should have been later released on DVD), the music, narration and history is great.  I own a lot of Mafia documentaries and I really like this one.  If you are a fan of these documentaries, I would buy this.  The music and the narrator are great in my opinion.  Al Capone and Johnny Torrio would be proud!  I wish someone would make this on DVD and spice it up a bit!
